title: Andras: Beyond Good and Evil
description: When the Marquis Andras Valletta, a world traveler and antique collector, returns to the beautiful island of Malta, he hires Graziella, a naïve history major, to assist him in the search of a powerful, ancient artifact. Graziella is immediately captivated by the charming and intriguing marquis, and finds that she is falling for him against her best friend Aurora’s advice.Graziella’s stay at the palazzo leads to insidious changes in her senses and appearance that she doesn’t notice until it’s too late. As Graziella becomes intertwined deeper with Andras, she realizes that his power over her isn’t natural, and she finally becomes aware of something eerie beyond their present encounter. The quest for the ancient heirloom transforms her forever.What is Andras’s true need for Graziella and her friend Aurora? Will Aurora, a driven alpha-female who allows nothing in the way of her goals, put her ambitions aside to help her friend? Will Graziella remain enthralled by her attraction to Andras, or will she have the strength to escape the darkness that surrounds her?
author: S.L. Zammit
